name: Dragons 'n Witches
description:
It's kinda like Galaga, but with Dragons... and witches. 

  • Left and right arrow keys to move
  • Take control of a fire-breathing dragon looking to rid the world of dreadful witches
  • 3 unique power-up gems available to strengthen or protect you (slay skulls for gems!)
  • Ramping difficulty
  • Note: There is no hitbox on your wings! Only on the dragon's head

This is my first "complete" Unity project! Coming from GMS2, I figured a simple 2D game was probably the best place to start. There's also plenty of room to expand on this idea, like more enemies, power-ups, and even bosses. I may also look into adding in different art later on to make it a more uniform style.
